name: AMShellScriptAction
desc: An object that represents Automator actions whose runtime behavior is driven by a shell script or by a Perl or Python script.

items.name: var inputFieldSeparator: String
items.desc: A string to use as the delimiter between items in the string passed to the action through standard input.

items.name: var outputFieldSeparator: String
items.desc: A string to use as a delimiter in the string output by the action.

items.name: var remapLineEndings: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether you want automatic remapping of carriage return (\r) to newline (\n) characters in the input string.
